Texas COVID-19 Vaccine Tracker

The reach of COVID-19 on Texas and the world has been devastating. As our state joins a global effort to put coronavirus into our past, we are tracking the Texas vaccine roll-out as it unfolds in real-time.

Texas has 22,421,178 people above the age of 16 who are currently eligible for the vaccine. As of Apr 06, 2021, the state has:

| Fully Vaccinated: 4,906,823 people or 22% of the population 16+
| Vaccinated w/ At Least One Dose: 8,434,288 people or 38% of the population 16+
| Administered: 70,006 doses in one day on Apr 06, 2021 or 0.31% of the population 16+
| A 7-Day Average of 182,175 administered per day or 0.81% of the population 16+

Explore More Texas Vaccine Data:

Texas COVID-19 Vaccine Tracker

The reach of COVID-19 on Texas and the world has been devastating. As our state joins a global effort to put coronavirus into our past, we are tracking the Texas vaccine roll-out as it unfolds in real-time.

Texas has 22,421,178 people above the age of 16 who are currently eligible for the vaccine. As of Apr 06, 2021, the state has:

| Fully Vaccinated: 4,906,823 people or 22% of the population 16+
| Vaccinated w/ At Least One Dose: 8,434,288 people or 38% of the population 16+
| Administered: 70,006 doses in one day on Apr 06, 2021 or 0.31% of the population 16+
| A 7-Day Average of 182,175 administered per day or 0.81% of the population 16+
